com.atc.simulator.display.view.model_instance_providers

Class SimpleDisplayRenderableProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atc.simulator.display.view.model_instance_providers.SimpleDisplayRenderableProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayRenderableProvider, Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AircraftDotModel, AircraftInfoModel, BreadCrumbModel, HudModel, PredictionModel, TracksModel, VelocityModel, WorldMapModel

    public abstract class SimpleDisplayRenderableProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements DisplayRenderableProvider
    A simple implementation of MOdelInstanceProvider, providing a single instance.
